Tailwind Components

Welcome to a very simple 'style guide' or 'component reference'.

This site is formatted using Tailwind CSS v3. No custom styles have been added.

Notes

In this simple site we have used a few lines of JS to dynamically load content into the main area.

Clicking on the menu items on the left will reveal the content for that section.
